Text:
Hey BONE, I just installed this on my Galaxy Note (GT-N8010) and I found it crashes from time to time. The most noticable crash I've found it when you try to write on a sign. I decided to install it on my Galaxy S and it worked fine (it's an earlier model).
Your Minecraft 0.5.0 worked fine, so I'm not sure what's up with this one.
People are writing on playstore about crashing when writing signs, so its the game itself. This upload is fine. Personally i can write signs without any problem on my Note n7000.
Great ! Thank for next upload Bone :)
@Fruitcaked: ah, okay. It's good to hear that the compatibility didn't just randomly change, because my Samsung Galaxy Note is fairly new, and is up-to-date. Thank you for the info. :)
New to Android downloads....Sorry :( I have it downloaded and am getting a "problem parsing the package" error when trying to install. I have a Motorola Triumph running 2.2.2 o/s.
Parse Error: There is a Problem Parsing the Package
Order and Chaos doesn't work.  It says checking license then closes :-(
i cant install the game it says problem parsing what can I do?
works great for me on my HTC ONE S. *thanks bone*
THAKS IT WORKS!!! Nice job BONE
